name: Away've
description:
There is no escape from a tsunami. Your only hope is to sail 'Away've'! 

In this 2D Side-Scrolling adventure, your goal is to outrun a giant tsunami for as long as possible. Along your journey, avoid rocks, shipwrecks and dastardly pirates but make sure to loot islands for resources to upgrade your ship.

How far will your journey take you?

Created for a Game Jam with the theme "away"

Away've features controller support! (Still working on it)
